attributes.action: Keep GCSE's in favour of E-BAC's and Review Michael Goves place on the Cabinet
attributes.additional_details: Review the recent proposals to the Secondary Education System to save GCSE's! Many people argue that GCSE's should be saved as they have worked for years and Michael Gove should look at ways to improve them rather than axing them for E-Bacs! Perhaps Michael Gove should be replaced by someone that understands Modern Education!
